Kernel.description: The core orchestrator in Semantic Kernel that manages plugins, memory, and execution of functions
usage_examples:
from semantic_kernel import Kernel
kernel = Kernel()

KernelPlugin.description: A collection of related semantic functions in Semantic Kernel
usage_examples:
from semantic_kernel import KernelPlugin

plugin = KernelPlugin(name="WriterPlugin", description="Plugin for writing tasks")

SemanticFunction.description: A function that leverages AI models for semantic understanding and generation

Memory.description: Semantic memory system for storing and retrieving information
usage_examples:
from semantic_kernel.memory import VolatileMemoryStore

memory = VolatileMemoryStore()
kernel.register_memory_store(memory)

Plan.description: A structured sequence of functions to achieve a specific goal
usage_examples:
# Plans in Semantic Kernel are created by chaining functions
result = await kernel.invoke(plugin["function_name"], input_variable="value")

common_user_intents.make agents talk to each other: Use Semantic Kernel's planning and orchestration capabilities to chain functions across plugins
common_user_intents.coordinate activities: Create Plans that coordinate between different plugins and semantic functions
common_user_intents.share information: Use the Memory system to share information between different functions and plugins
